idea-plugin.change-notes: Fixed plugin page buttons colors. Updated theme colors for debugger, selections and static/nonstaticmethods
idea-plugin.name: Hiberbee Theme
idea-plugin.description: Monokai Pro & MacOS Mojave inspired color themes, with bright colors & dark mode, with common color code for all languages. See description & screenshots on Github Check the sources, iTerm2, Windows and macOS Terminals and XCode color schemes also available
